0xE296208C273BD7F0.name: _REQUEST_LETTER_BOX_OVERTIME
0xE296208C273BD7F0.comment: Creates Cinematic Black Bars (at top and bottom) (this frame)

examples.code:
CreateThread(function()
    local inLetterBoxFrom = GetGameTimer()
    while GetGameTimer() - inLetterBoxFrom >= 10000 do
        Wait(0)
        RequestLetterBoxOvertime(1000, 1000)
    end
end)
